entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
